column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I visited this restaurant for the first time a few weeks ago and really enjoyed it! The service was really amazing
column2: we sat in the basement which I also thought had a more fun vibe then the main floor. My boyfriend ordered the Oysters which were definitely his least favorite part (he has had better else where)
column3: but the rest of our meal was wonderful! I tried the fried chicken which was better than I expected as it was boneless which was a nice surprise! Would definitely return here again
